Class StoreFront

java.lang.Object
com.storefront.ui.StoreFront
public class StoreFront extends Object
The StoreFront class represents the user interface for the storefront application. It allows users to view inventory, add/remove products from the shopping cart, checkout, and view past orders.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StoreFront()
    Constructs a StoreFront instance, initializes the inventory, and sets up the shopping cart.
